  • All About Me

    I'm a front-end developer, that occasionally likes to look over the fence to see what the back-end is up to. Recent implant in South Carolina, by way of Northern Israel. I spend my day pounding the, proverbial, internet pavement; fully immersed in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap through freelance projects.
